What are the treatments for Brown-Sequard Syndrome ?,Generally treatment for individuals with BSS focuses on the underlying cause of the disorder. Early treatment with high-dose steroids may be beneficial in many cases. Other treatment is symptomatic and supportive.,NINDS,Brown-Sequard Syndrome
